channel.description: 1. The Gameframe, I want the 317 gameframe. 2. I want the firecape to move instead of just sitting there. 3. I want the 317 welcome screen (if there was one) 4. Chat heads are messed up on dialogues, how can I fix it?

item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

  1. The Gameframe, I want the 317 gameframe.
  2. I want the firecape to move instead of just sitting there.
  3. I want the 317 welcome screen (if there was one)
  4. Chat heads are messed up on dialogues, how can I fix it?
